containerVersion.name: JY Insights Gold Plus GA4 - v1.4
containerVersion.description: Complete GA4 tracking for Shopify storefront and checkout with enhanced ecommerce, user data collection, quick view tracking (view_type parameter), list attribution persistence (item_list_id/item_list_name from storefront to checkout), and marketing platform integration. Supports revenue attribution by source collection/search.

parameter.value:
<script>
fbq('track', 'Purchase', {
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}',
  content_ids: {{DLV - ecommerce.items}}.map(function(item) { return item.item_id; }),
  content_type: 'product',
  num_items: {{DLV - ecommerce.items}}.length
});
</script>
